★MULTIPLE COLORS: Our leggings have more than 20 available colors. These colors are very fashionable and beautiful and great for pairing with a variety of clothes and shoes so that you have yourself unique style of dress in each season and they are perfect for adding to your wardrobes.
★HIGH WAIST: Our leggings made from a polyester-blend fabric with a touch of spandex for easy, comfy wear. Cut in a high-rise silhouette with a slim fit and finished with a full elastic wide waistband, tummy control wide waistband contours your curves and streamlines your shape.
★SOFT FABRIC: You will love our leggings once you put them on and experience a combination of softness and stretchiness. They are made from 92% polyester and 8% Spandex to give you freedom of movement no matter what you’re doing. These super soft leggings will gently caress your lower half like a second skin. “Small/Medium = One Size US 2-12”, “Large/X-Large = Plus Size US 12-24” or “XX-Large = Extra Size US 24-32 “, which are designed to figure flattering and supportive for all sizes.

item.title: PGA TOUR Women’s Pull-on Golf Pant with Tummy Control (Size X-Small-Xx-Large)
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: Price: (as of – Details) Get ready to hit the course in style in these PGA TOUR women’s golf pants. Made with plain weave fabric for durability, these golf trousers for ladies are sure to stand up to regular wear and will definitely become a favorite piece in your golf wear with all its performance ... Read more
item.content:encoded:
Price: $43.49
(as of Nov 29,2022 01:42:45 UTC – Details)


Get ready to hit the course in style in these PGA TOUR women’s golf pants. Made with plain weave fabric for durability, these golf trousers for ladies are sure to stand up to regular wear and will definitely become a favorite piece in your golf wear with all its performance features. Moisture-wicking technology helps you stay dry and confident as you play as it moves perspiration away from your skin. Sun protection prevents damaging UV rays from penetrating the fabric of the golf apparel. Performance stretch in the material lets you swing, bend and crouch in total comfort with a maximum range of motion. The design of the pull-on golf pants makes it quick and easy to get ready and the ladies slacks feature built-in shapewear at the tummy for a slimming effect that smooths your figure. A mid-rise cut sits just above the hips while vents in the hem of the pants provides a better fit with your golf shoes so that the golf pants don’t bunch up at the bottom. Two side pockets and a back pocket, give you plenty of room to keep your tees, balls and more close at hand. Not only are these ladies trousers for golf great to wear on the course with a PGA Tour golf shirt, they are also perfect to wear out and around town with a blouse or tee.
Product Dimensions ‏ : ‎ 5 x 5 x 0.7 inches; 11.36 Ounces
Item model number ‏ : ‎ PVBF7011
Date First Available ‏ : ‎ August 7, 2017
Manufacturer ‏ : ‎ PGA Tour Women’s Athletic
ASIN ‏ : ‎ B073JMDFHN

Imported
Pull On closure
Machine Wash
MOISTURE WICKING: Built-in moisture-wicking technology in the women’s golf pants moves perspiration away from the body to provide a dry fit that’s comfortable for all day wear.
PERFORMANCE STRETCH: The innovative material of the women’s golf slacks is made to stretch, allowing for a wider range of unrestricted movement and greater range of motion as you play.
SUN PROTECTION: Sun protection prevents damaging UV rays from penetrating the fabric of the golf trousers to help protect covered skin on sunny days.
